titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 310 South State Street in St. Ignace, Michigan, as the "Robert W. Davis Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/3/2001--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal facility located at 310 South State Street in St. Ignace, Michigan, as the Robert W. Davis Post Office Building.
